reviews.review_title: The fact that aspiring actors, directors, and writers can't find work while this crap is produced is absolutely appalling.
reviews.content: This left me speechless......and not in a breath-taking "Shawshank Redemption" type way! I literally wanted to rip my arm off and throw it at the TV it was so bad. My husband and I made a bet with one another as to who could keep watching it the longest........the loser buying the weekend beers! I was quite happy to lose that night. I had no idea what was going on, it kept skipping from one sketch to another with no plot, no reason and NO POINT! Awful acting, awful impressions, awful film! Pretty much is what it says on the tin, A Disaster. Do not watch this movie. You'd be better off stapling your genitals to a table for an hour...it'll be less painful for you!

I don't know what is with these people. The people that made this movie have bad taste. These people would make fun of really awesome people by making them look like geeks and weirdos. One question I want to ask is Why? Why did the actors even want to be in the movie. I think it's because the actors have bad taste too. Is it possible to rate below 0? I wanted to rate this a negative 10. This was overall just beyond stupid. I am warning you now, whatever you do, don't watch this movie ever! I would rather encounter the joker, have him give me an overdose of his joker toxin and take me to the top of mount everest and throw me down.

reviews.review_title: Ugh, A gunshot to the Entertainment Industry
reviews.content: I honestly think that the Entertianment Industry is dying. It's dying because crap like this is being injected into it like heroin. In fact these movies are like heroin. The Industry continues to produce this crap so it obviously can't seem to stop. Herion is like any other drug it takes away your health, time, money, and eventually your life. Crap like this is whats killing the EI (Entertianment Industry) and the more that Aron and Jason continue to produce these suckfests (I got tired of using the word crap and IMDb wont let me say S@#$%#) that people for some reason call movies the worse it's going to get. Judging by the other reviews I don't think I need to explain how bad this movie is to you readers. Aaron Seltzer and Jason Friedberg should be sent to prison. Not for crimes against humanity (with the exception of the actors and actresses that "prefromed" in this "movie'' which kills me to call it that) but for hate crimes against the reputation of comedy movies and the EI. Both of these idiots need to burn in hell forever and this mess needs to be erased from humanity. I could go on and rant a little more but if you really want to know what is wrong with this movie, read the other reviews. -00000.1/10
This movie is campy and fun. I was shocked to see a 1.9 rating. It's not meant to be an Emmy winner; you guys clearly don't get it. (facepalm)

reviews.review_title: Why, Did you rape the Cinema
reviews.content: All i can say is WOW, on the fact that this movie got budget, what would have been funny to put in this feature, is the writers coming up with there ideas and one of them agreeing on it, now thats stand up comedy right there.The fact that there was outtake was mind boggling, that in the final edit they picked what they picked, its a sad day for the movie world and for the cast of mad TV Why did you accept this role, mad TV has better writers then this so called movie.Please anyone who values the essence of time and humanity its self, don't watch this movie

I cant describe how awful this movie was. Some people say this movie is great (and thats OK since we all have different views) but frankly i don't give a damn. this movie was so terrible its freaking hilarious yes i know they made fun of maybe great movies but who the hell likes listening to a girl burp for 5 minutes?? And you would think they didn't have to use "each" joke for to long but then you're wrong. Because they manage to take a joke (everyone of them) which is not funny in the beginning and wear it up so that you only want to end your life there and then just to make it stop. If you're ever going to see this movie Don't!

Now I'm not a fan of the filmmakers and their last effort, MEET THE SPARTANS, was horrendously unfunny. So I was dreading DISASTER MOVIE but am surprised to admit that it actually had some solid laughs. The film is essentially a free form blender of pop culture references in scene after scene with a threadbare plot to connect them. However, the interesting thing about the satire here is how dark and cynical it is. The film rightly points out the cynicism and hypocrisy of teen entertainment (ex. the shallow consumerism and robotic nature of HANNAH MONTANA, the mindless songs and false chasteness of HIGH SCHOOL MUSICAL, the overwritten, annoying banter of JUNO, et al.). Even family films are deservedly skewered (the heroine of ENCHANTED turned into a drugged out, homeless hooker, KUNG FU PANDA literally a guy in a costume brawling it out and best of all, the savage ALVIN & THE CHIPMUNKS sequence that turns them into CRITTERS style, metal loving evil puppets). And how true it is that the summer blockbusters consist of one comic book film after another being churned into the marketplace for our consumption (the film correctly portrays the "superheroes" in this fashion, with a cow splattering each of them one by one). Add to that a musical number that ties all of these references together in a seamless fashion. Friedberg and Seltzer still have an amateurish quality to their film-making and several sequences are allowed to drag on a bit to kill time. But overall this is definitely worth a look and maybe you'll be surprised.

reviews.review_title: The name says it all... Really, not joking...
reviews.content: I saw this last night and was disgusted... it was a disaster, that has to be how they got the title, they named it after how it would fate... the jokes were not truly terrible the first time they threw it out there, but then they dragged it through the mud, killed it, then they resurrected it to drag and kill it again, then! Then, they did it againi truly believe this could have been a decent spoof movie if; a) the jokes were not dragged out so long b) they had not gone for the gross-out factor so oftenthe worst part is, i am certain if they took out the draggy jokes and gross-out scenes, this would have been no longer than a 30 minute episode of something... to think, so many more movies could have been spoofed in here to help make it longer, instead of what was done.if you are a sucker for truly terrible movies, then please, ignore me and just go see this But, if you value your money, then save it and don't go near this disaster of a filmi should have known this would be bad when the screen lengthened before it started - they couldn't afford a widescreen camera!And before you go dissing my opinion, i love spoofs, really, i think they can be funny and interesting and make you want to see the original movie. I never saw a few of the movies spoofed, and i never want to see them, they were represented so badly, and of the movies i did see that were spoofed, they did not make me want to see them again.

There seems to be a boycott going on against this movie (and the 'spoof movie' series), as the rating indicates. Granted, those movies have an old, tired formula, and they're all very similar, so I really don't know why people who don't like these kind of movies insist on watching them.Silly jokes, vulgarity, impersonations - that's what this movie is about. It's a mindless comedy that tries to cram up as much pop-culture as they can make fun of. The plot can probably be summarized in one line. You don't really have to pay attention to this movie, and as such, I was entertained.There were several laugh-out-loud moments here, but unfortunately this movie (like all others in this vein) suffers from over-repetition of jokes, some go on for too long and some that are not really funny.While "Disaster Movie" isn't a comedic masterpiece, it's not nearly as bad a film as people make it out to be. I'd say it's okay. So if you don't like silliness, stay away. I had some fun, and that's what I was expecting.

I saw this movie with four friends, and we were all laughing our heads off from beginning to end! I don't care if the movie doesn't have realistic acting, I don't care if the plot isn't meaningful; it's not meant to be! People, please judge a movie by what it's meant for! What I loved about this movie was that it included the characters from many classic cartoons in the most bizarre ways possible! Seeing Alvin and the chipmunks going mad, Kung Fu Panda coming out of no where to fight, Batman being humiliated, and the whole nonsense of this movie made me enjoy my time and go to bed with a smile on my face. I've also seen Superhero Movie, Epic movie, and a few others in this gender, though this was the first one I saw, and the most I enjoyed. I give it a 10, but only for THIS gender. This doesn't mean I enjoyed this movie more than I did, say, "Inglorious Basterds", which I gave a 9; I'm simply judging the movie by what it's meant to be and in it's own gender.

omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg omg That was HORRIBLE 87 minutes! This movie sucks! its not funny, has this idiots thinking they can act and apparently love to waste your time! don't watch! i repeat don't watch! whoever made the bad jokes should seriously check his reportoire. so this brings my final comment on this movie to:-----> See movie Title <-----

I didn't start watching this expecting an absolutely GREAT movie, but I at least wanted to laugh a little bit. The few attempts at humor completely failed. I expected to find a movie with "Meet the Spartans" humor, but the only attempts at humor weren't with witty dialogue but rather with too many unfunny references. I generally love this sort of movie, even though the jokes can sometimes be immature, but the jokes in this movie were so childish that even a three-year old would scoff at the minor chuckles of his two and one year old counterparts. That said, this movie shows that the standards in spoof movies have sunken so low, that we probably won't see another major theater release of one for years to come.

reviews.review_title: Worst movie I have ever seen. 0/10 if possible.
reviews.content: I'm not excusing this because it is a parody, this is the worst Motion Picture I have ever seen, by the time I had finished this movie, I had vomited almost 10 times, and I cried in a corner, questioning humanity, NEVER watch this.

0 StarsI went through an obsession with these types of movie as a 12 year old, so it has sentimental value. It's background noise that you tune into every now and then to chuckle at. The song at the end is fire.

Good, I myself am a person who'll pretty much laugh at anything however when I stepped into the theater, expecting to to see another one of these guys movie to be "So bad it's o.k" with me laughing at every attempt at a joke or good acting.Not this one. When I walked out of the theater, it was like someone killed my dog. It was horrible. I just could laugh at anything. ANYTHING. The "jokes" have gotten old and the movie is just filled with immature jokes and cussing that only idiotic teenagers would like.I know it's a parody movie but seriously guys, please, try writing a good script and try to not pull something out of your asses you think is going to be funny.I'm not even going to go into the plot.The acting is horrible and seem to just be people they hired off the street for 200$.Anyway, they're movie have officially have sunken to a new low. They're rated the second worse movie of all time, almost every bloody review about this movie has been God awful. AND THEY STILL GOT MOVIE FROM IT! That is it. !@#$ it. Don't see anything else these two make considering it's just going to be another turd that tries to make you laugh with fart jokes.Just stay the !@$# away from this horse !@#$.

This movie was a repulsive cinematic experience. The humor was bleak at best and the whole premise of the film is old and completely worn out.Disaster Movie is truly a stinker of a film, an embarrassment for all involved, from the writers, actors, and directors to the audience members who lacked the better judgment to give this film a miss and save themselves 87 valuable minutes of their lives. These 87 minutes were completely squandered as the film manages to continuously sap the viewer's will to live, degrading them to a shivering wreck by the time it drags itself to the much anticipated final credits. This movie plunges so deep down in to the ranks of awful films that it is unwatchable even to for the seasoned ironic moviegoer. I cannot even recommend this to anyone or anything as this blight on the human race degrades the fabric of the viewer's very being, making it unsuitable for children, animals and most vegetation. Disaster Movie is a slimy lump of snot that has been birthed in the depths of hell and dragged itself out to the land of the living to corrupt the moral fiber of humanity and leave a trail of quivering horror in its wake.

reviews.review_title: even in 2008, jokes about abortion and child trafficking
reviews.content: I only lasted long enough to be completely amazed at the silly gross infantile yet adult themes when the baby killing wokeness appeared and I felt compelled to remove myself from the online demographic statistic. Remember that Nielsen ratings were the grossest kind of approximation, and the entertainment industry ran on them for years. Today there is a technology that can capture down to the nanosecond how long you watched something, and other tech reports on every consumer detail in your profile.

God damn was this movie awful. Not only did I fall asleep, but my pets did as well. The only movie I can think of that had worse acting is Robot Ninja. You haven't heard of it because it is awful. Kim was downright terrible. The writers to this movie....jeez, really how the hell do the keep getting this stuff approved? Though there were several laughable parts, it was overall just one of the worst movies I have ever seen. And I have seen some pretty BAD movies (Robot Ninja mentioned earlier)..The writers need to start coming up with some original stuff instead of knocking off EVERYONE else. It wasn't good the first time we saw it, why would it be good when you ruin it? I'm finished even talking about this stupid STUPID movie.

I've felt compelled to register on IMDb just to register my sadness at watching this film.I've had more fun reading all the IMDb comments for this film than I got from watching the movie. I wished I'd watched Gigli now! Disaster movie is I think the worst movie ever made. It lacks any redeeming value. I feel violated as I actually PAID to watch it . I downloaded it on the Xbox 360 as a random movie. I actually like some of the scary movie films and thought this was by the same team. It is not.As many people have pointed out it does not actually spoof disaster movies. I mean think of the possibilities of spoofing the towering inferno, Earthquake, Armageddon and all those 70's films.This merely tries to parody this years crop of movies and celebrities.The Amy whinehouse impersonation was frankly embarrassing. The Hannah Montana bit . It wasn't funny the first time. They then repeat the 'gag' (so called because I felt like gagging at the poor quality film) 4 times again. I watched the first 20 minutes with my wife, then we forwarded a bit looking for a joke, then again , then basically we just turned it off.All the comments are spot on. They have to announce the jokes repeatedly.I feel violated as I both paid £3.50 for this film ,and wasted some 30 minutes of my life on this rubbish.PLease don't watch it, don't watch any film ever made by the people involved in this film again.NOTE ONE JOKE WAS INVOLVED IN THE WHOLE FILM!!!!

reviews.review_title: It's Called Disaster Movie For A Reason
reviews.content: WARINING MAY CONTAIN SPOILER!I have seen a LOT of bad movies in my life but this is one of the worst. I honestly hoped it would be good. I'm a big fan of spoof movies and watching the preview, I thought it could be the next Epic Movie, but boy was I wrong. It actually had a lot of potential but they didn't even utilize the jokes they could have used. They didn't even TRY to make this funny, THEY DIDN'T EVEN TRY! The jokes seemed like they were written by a nine-year old with Tourettes Syndrome! There was not one thing funny about this movie, in fact it doesn't even qualify as a movie! This crap makes "Meet The Spartans" look good! "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3" was better than this and thats saying a lot! If you see this "movie" sitting on the shelf of a store, walk away from it and never look back!

reviews.review_title: The single worst movie I have ever seen.
reviews.content: I hesitate to even call it a movie, as it would be an insult to movies.To be fair, I knew this movie was bad. I heard the reviews, but I wanted to see it anyway just to know if it was actually as bad as people said.It is. Every single, solitary second of it.I want to forget this movie exists. If there was a way to make everyone forget this movie exists and wipe it clean of the face of the earth, then let it be done. You will gain nothing from watching this film. You will lose brain cells. It is a blight on humanity, and I'm appalled that the directors of this filth continued to make movies after this. They should never direct another film as long as they live.Avoid this like the plague.

I understand that a lot of reviews are usually done cause someone liked it, didn't like it, or completely didn't understand it. This is in no way a movie that I would watch multiple times. However, people are completely misunderstanding the reason these movies are even made (Meet the spartans, date movie). The movie industry is absolute trash and even the society around these movies and what they actually believe in or stimulated by is also complete trash. These movies make fun of those movies but they do it in such a terrible terrible way that it should put into perspective how bad the original movies they are making fun of are. I wouldn't buy these movies and I sure as hell wouldn't go see it in theaters, but I give them a thumbs up for making trash portray how much trash is in the movie industry today. Keep up the cynical, facetious, and over the top anti-humor. I commend you, and I only recommend watching this in bits or if you are bored to absolute death.

I have seen some truly dumb movies but Disaster Movie puts itself in a totally different league....It's the worst movie I have ever seen or will ever be made.It's full of silly jokes that don't make much sense at all.This is the worst spoof movie ever made.This movie brings shame to the spoof genre. So if you liked Scary movie series or the Naked gun series please skip this movie because after watching the Disaster Movie you will begin to hate all the spoof movies ever made.So please if you want to save yourself from 90 minutes of torture don't watch this movie.

This is a disaster. There is nothing funny in the movie. Everything about it is an embarrassment. The acting is so awful. It is a painful experience. There is no enjoyment from anything over the course of it's runtime. It's a total mess. The jokes are so annoying and bad. It is a total waste of everything in comedy films. It is the worst movie ever made. The film going completely insane with it's movie references. It doesn't work at all. They mash a bunch of stuff together from a load of movies and it is nonsense. The movies shoves so much at the viewer and it is a total cringe nightmare. It's a very boring film. It keeps dragging on and on.

reviews.review_title: This movie made me give up on life
reviews.content: I went to see this film hoping that it would be so bad that I would actually find it funny (like Battlefield Earth), however this film ended up being so horrifically bad that words cannot describe this how this bile made me feel.A film that uses its 100% of its 90mins to reference things that have happened in American pop culture, and being from the UK I had no idea as to what half the gags were about! No plot, no funny jokes, just an empty shell of a movie. It's upsetting that this pile of crap is allowed to be released into mainstream cinemas.The film cost $25M to make, and so far has only raked in $12M, WELL DONE EVERYBODY! Hitting the studios in the pockets is the only way that these 2 will get no finance to make more movies.

reviews.review_title: may cause you to vomit in rage.
reviews.content: you remember how back in highschool while everyone was laughing their asses off at an especially clever string of jokes their would always be this one kid who would see this is as an opportunity to get popular and attempt to inject a terribly unfunny quote into the mix, instantly killing everyone's fun and drawing blank stares and utter resentment? You remember that this kid would be reminded of that one moment for the rest of this highschool career and tormented endlessly, possibly beaten, possible brutally? Now imagine there are two of these mindless parasitic tools, and apply those oh so valuable social lessons learned in school.Failburg & Seltzerwater should never EVER be allowed to live this down, I implore everyone who sees them in public, knows them, or is related to them to remind them on a daily basis - SEVERAL times per day what a pathetic failure this movie (and in fact all their movies) has been, torment them until they commit suicide or at least go into voluntary exile in the Amazon rainforest.

I have good news, and I have bad news. Good news: This is the best film of the Genre Movie series. Bad news: it's still crass, stupid, and boring. The difference between it and its fellows is that even though nearly every gag in the picture has to do with bodily functions, sex, or striking men in the privates, there is an occasional moment of wit or talent in this one! Yes, folks, just as she does when needed on MADtv, Nicole Parker saves this movie from the status of atrocity to mediocrity. She should do films more often. She is just as funny on the big screen as on the small. Anyway, I cannot in good faith recommend this movie, but it's not without its moments. So, let this review guide you as you wish.

Worst movie disaster ever! 128 minutes long and the only best bit was the last 12 minutes of rolling credits. I can't believe it got funding and was made. If you want to see the most unfunny movie ever (though toddlers will like it), watch streaming so you can jump through it, unlike TV. Terrible. O/10 if I could.

reviews.review_title: Scott you just farted on my bedsheets
reviews.content: A long long time ago in a galaxy far far away...A cinematic masterpiece!This compelling story with it's jaw-dropping dialogue (and surplus grain) just leaves the viewer in awe and wanting more!This film is a true reflection on what George Bush jr. once said: "You teach a child to read, and he or her will be able to pass a literacy test." -Townsend, Tenn., Feb. 21, 2001Just imagine sitting on a stool.Now stop.I'd like to thank my friends and family for their continued support whilst I have composed my heart felt review of what I believe to be the finest piece of cinematic magic to have ever graced the screen of my good friend Ralph's television.What is your favourite colour...No the correct answer is Orange.Now imagine sitting on that beloved stool again thinking of your favourite colour (which most better be cardboard)

This movie (and I'm being generous with the term) waste of an hour and a half of my life. I thought I was being an edgy teen going to see that movie, but walking out of that movie when it was finally over, even 13-year-old me wondered, "who on earth was this for?"I'm honestly shocked that the team behind this movie went on to make a couple others after this one. This movie was a disaster and the title was so fitting. I suppose the one thing this movie could be useful for would be for someone looking back on the year 2008 and trying to figure out what had come out within the last year and a half or so. Most of the jokes amounted to a character appearing and announcing "hi! I'm (insert name of pop culture icon)" and then getting killed somehow. 1/10 feels generous.
I just watched about 1 minute of this movie via DirecTV (FUSION), and all I can say is...Why did they make this movie? I give this disaster of a movie a -10.

reviews.review_title: Oh My Gosh! Poop, pee, barf, and boob joke! sO fUnNyY!
reviews.content: In case you don't know, that was sarcasm. Honestly, I would pay a significant amount of money so that people do not fall into the trap of watching this garbage. Please, please, I beg of you, pleading on my knees, I sincerely ask you: Do not watch this movie! This movie is nothing more than a disgrace to cinema! It's nothing more than a piece of constipated poop ominously dropping off the sides of the toilet seat from the depths of those heinous bowels. It is more painful then having a door wrapped in barbwire shoved up your butt sideways. Childbirth is but pleasant compared the agonizing, torturous, and cringe-inducing 87-minute experience you go through when watch this. The pain is much more extreme than that of when you chug a ton of hot sauce and then have to go to the bathroom later that day, only to find out that you are releasing scorching hot diarrhea out of your anus, which feels no better than pure lava. It is not any better than stepping on a Lego ten times in a row, or being flayed alive, or being tormented by having boiling oil poured all over your skin. Do you understand what I am saying? What you undergo when watching this movie is not pleasant!This doesn't even qualify for 'so bad it's good'. This was torture. I didn't even crack a smile once. Not even the Matt Damon jokes were funny! How? How could you make a Matt Damon joke not funny?There are numerous bad movies out there, such as 'Meet the Spartans', 'Epic Movie', and 'Date Movie', but this!? This!? Why was this released? None of the jokes are funny, the acting is garbage, the dialogue is horrendous, and the humor is unnecessarily crude and stupid. After watching this, I couldn't stop vomiting. It's that bad.Juney, who is supposed to be this quirky pregnant teen, talks like an idiot. She is supposed to exaggerate the style of speech which is common among Gen-Z's, but it's not funny and it's stupid as heck. It's. Not. Funny. At. All.Do yourself a favor: Do not watch this. Watch something good, like Vertigo, Casablanca, The Godfather, Citizen Kane, or if you would prefer a comedy movie, then you should watch something like 'Some Like It Hot', 'Arsenic and Old Lace', or Doctor Strangelove: Or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb'. Those are some good comedy movies. Not this trash. If you want a good reason to stab yourself in the eye with a fork, then watch this. Otherwise, don't.

reviews.review_title: Not one chuckle , so hard to watch.
reviews.content: I watched it thinking there's no way a movie can be that bad based on rating... it was very hard to watch from start to end . Yes it's bad!

reviews.review_title: The most boring parody movie ever conceived
reviews.content: I have never seen a more boring parody movie ever, it follows the same formula for its jokes from every other horrible parody movie, god it's so boring I might fall asleep just thinking about it.

reviews.review_title: Did they try and make the worse film ever?
reviews.content: I've given this travesty 3 stars instead of 1 on the off chance that the creators deliberately went out to make the most annoying and unfunny film they possibly could. Kinda like a parody of a parody. In a strange way, it could be considered genius.This isn't even a so bad it's good. It's a diabolical viewing experience. 100% deserves its lowest rated film of all time honour.

reviews.review_title: 3 out of 10 and I'm being very nice (thank me for being an Indyfan)
reviews.content: I wouldn't say this film is disgusting but it's terribly childish.It's all 5 year old fantasies only kids at that age would find this funny. What's with all the shitty male nudity and bad make ups/special effects? This film is sooooo horrible to describe in words. But I'm being veeeerryy nice to give a 3 instead of 1. 1 point for the effort, 1 for the music (at least the dances and musics were good) and 1 for the cool Indiana Jones shadow (I'm a major indyfan so, but shadow was the only thing cool about it) that's all i've got to say. I'm just shocked at how childish this film is. Annoying laughter,spoofs and male nudity. What can be worse than this?

I loved all the Scary movies and have at least enjoyed a good laugh from all the others in the series. This movie though, wow.The opening line (which is one word) and ONE other line 50 minutes into the movie were the only parts where I actually laughed out loud. For the rest of the movie I was waiting for a punchline or even a cheap fart joke to get something out of me.Nothing.Amy Winehouse was their easiest target in this entire thing and they couldn't even write one good bit regarding her boyfriend, her alcoholism or her racism. Not one. It takes a group of writers a lot of work to NOT be able to make her situation funny.The rest of the spoofs are terrible at best with the exception to Juno the FIRST time they make it. They run it into the ground by making Juney a main character for a good length of the movie.Movies like this are why people pirate DVDs today, because they shouldn't have to pay for garbage like this.

This film isn't funny, even the ironic title is not funny. It's so bad, even the name of this review is not funny. Such a bad film deserves a badly constructed review. This seems to be a spoof of bad films. But films like Hancock, Batman, etc etc are not bad so therefore it's a spoof of its own. Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer, you two are idiots. The jokes are not clever. The plot is rubbish. Stringing together characters of other films from 2007-2008 is possibly the worst idea I have ever seen. Some of the scenes are a shameless-no shameful copy of the films that they supposed to parody. Parody? This is too ironic- like my review.

reviews.review_title: They make em because people love to laugh
reviews.content: I can't believe how hard reviews are for this film.First people decided that the dark knight was a masterpiece that had to be viewed 5 times at the theater and now they decided to shrink the rating of this film at below 2/10.(at least,it's where it's at as i am writing my review).Things go in waves.One second a scary movie makes over 100 million,the other second,people snob a comedy like superhero movie. One second,meet the spartans is number one,the other second,people snob another movie spoof like disaster movie.Disaster movie has it share of gross jokes (which i never liked but it goes with the territory) and a few jokes that don't work. But it also have situations that do make us laugh(the rub on spoof or whatever it's call is totally hilarious!)Whatever's the case,spoofs are not dead but apparently people weren't in the mood for laughing this weekend.

This movie is the worst movie ever to exist. Usually i'll go into a movie and come out saying it was ether great, good, OK or bad. I don't get mad, but this piece of hot garbage made me want to hack my limbs off. If you go to this movie and don't come out with your intelligence insulted something may be wrong with you. These guys don't even try, it feels like they just watch trailers from summer movies, then put on the outfits and do something dumb. If you're going to go see this movie out of curiosity please (and i don't usually promote this) Buy a ticket to some other movie then sneak in this. If there is a person guarding the door he/she most likely will let you in with the thought of "see it at your own risk"
I don't know why this negative feedback ! i see it a good movie and makes me laughing , it's just a comedy one with childish story and expected steps but i really think it has a good comedy

reviews.review_title: Funny if you enjoy the Extremely Stupid
reviews.content: "The human race has one really effective weapon, and that is laughter."-Mark TwainI am not sure when it became OK to keep making movies that virtually no one goes to see, but in the case of the recent plethora of spoof films I for one am glad that they continue.Now I know a lot of people out there cannot even fathom why people would enjoy such stupidity, but that is just it, you don't need to understand, sometimes people should just let go and be stupid.Stupid is the perfect word to describe "Disaster Movie" actually no matter how many times you say the word stupid, it would never be enough to justify just how stupid it is. But for me I absolutely love these stupid spoof movies.The "story", and I use this word very lightly, gives us Will, who is right in the middle of his Super Duper Sweeet Sixteen (even though he is actually 25) when the world starts coming under attack, from mostly meteorites, and tornado's, and earthquakes. Loosley following the "Cloverfeild" plot, Will must reach his girlfriend who is trapped in the Museum where she works.But does he have to do this alone? Of course not, there are plenty of stupid characters and even stupider obstacles that he must overcome.By far the best spoof on a character here is Juno, played by Crista Flannigan, who has done this before on Mad TV I think, she had me rolling on the floor more than anyone. Second to her is Nicole Parker, who is hilarious as Amy Winehouse, Jessica Simpson, but most of all the princess from Enchanted. Who is not actually a princess but a drugged out homeless chick, F-ing hilarious.Of course no movie is safe, everything from the past year gets made fun off, from Indiana Jones, all the way to Step Up. Most are funny some are really stupid.The one bad thing that I have to say, is that some of the Spoofs lasted way longer than they needed to, it should be spoof, spoof, spoof, story advance. Only it is Spooooooooof, Spoooooof, story advance. And how many characters does Ike Barenholts need to play, seriously its like they didn't have the budget for more actors. But he was pretty funny.All in all this was really good, definitely better than last years "Meet the Spartans" not as good as "Scary Movie" so I would rank it up there with "Epic Movie" which I thought was also great. If you like stupid, and you are not old enough to see "College" then you should really check this out.

No one seems to appreciate the beauty of Disaster Movie. As dumb as some parts may be, it still was hilarious! Yes, they made fun of some of the best movies, but thats the beauty. It opens your eyes to how dumb some of the other movies were. Also, the film makers were very clear about the movies they were mocking. There was no guessing required. It is totally a teen movie for sure though! I do NOT recommend this movie to ANY adult! The movie was not directed towards adults though!!!! Its not right for people other than the movie was directed toward, to rate this movie. It doesn't make sense why some people even bother watching/rating this movie!!!! Its like asking a 5 year old or an 80 year old to rate the movie Saw!

The word atrocious fails to do this film justice. In fact, no words can truly describe this film because using words to describe this film would legitimize this film. I thought it would be fun to watch the bottom 100 imdb rated films but I implore you NOT TO WATCH THIS FILM.1. It is torture.2. Every. Single. Joke. Is. Forced.3. Scenes that should last at most 3 minutes go on for 7 or more.4. outdated cultural references are used to pad the time and conform to that 90 minute run time.About the only remotely positive thing you can say is that Vanessa Lachey's acting was better than her co-stars (which is not even something to brag about).

An eye for an ay ay ay! What an utter disaster. If the movie has "movie" i the title (ergo "Epic Movie") it's garbage and you should punch whoever suggested watching this at the $2 theater, even if it's your sainted mother. Sorry but this is just...whew. 1/10, I wouldn't use this as toilet paper.

This movie is the worst ever! It is a disgrace that someone actually made it and even worse someone agreed to distribute it. The jokes are pathetic (if you can call them jokes) there is absolutely no story line. Not that you expect a story line for a spoof, but at least there should be a logical sequence of events. Not even the semi-hot girl is enough to warrant a 5 second view of the flick. The poor actors will most likely never find a job again. Carmen Electra is in the movie, she looks old and did a very bad job. If you want to see a good spoof movie, rent Top Secret or Airplane. Even the last pathetic Scary Movie is much better than this. I cannot really indicate to anybody how much this movie sucks.

Why are you still watching these movies? You are correct in what you are saying, but I personally stopped after halfway through the 2nd one I ever saw. As far as I know, the only people I've ever heard say anything was funny about this genre were mid-teens. I watched one such flick, hated it, gave a 2nd a try and shut it off. Nothing funny or clever whatsoever, yet they make enough money for profit for the studios. If this genre sucks so bad.... stop watching. Seems I have to add 3 more lines. What am I supposed to say? Stop watching, stop renting, stop supporting these films with any kind of comments, even... It just adds to the hype.
Lots and lots of weed and really really low expectations makes this movie pretty good. If you are bored and mad high you should watch this train wreck of a movie.

Even if you're a huge fan of crude humor, don't expect to get even the slightest bit of satisfaction here. The jokes are stale, immature, and repeated. The director and producer should be ashamed; the movie was riddled with continuity errors, and the plot didn't make much sense. One day I hope that the writer of this so-called movie learns that repeated fart jokes, poop jokes, and burp jokes are not funny in movies, especially after the 100th time. These actors should feel ashamed for selling themselves out to star in what could be the worst movie of all time.I have seen some terrible movies in my days, including Meet The Spartans, Delta Farce, Snow Day, Ice Age, and some other unbearable movies. Disaster Movie takes the cake as the worst movie I have ever seen in my life. After watching this film, I sat and thought about how much money was wasted with this atrocity of a film, and concluded that this movie is a disgrace to our western society. Save your money, time, and dignity; don't even consider seeing it.

I begged my boyfriend not to make me watch it but he did anyway. Disaster movie is the absolute worst movie I have ever seen, and this is coming from someone who thoroughly enjoys the entire Scary Movie franchise- this just isn't even funny. The writers threw random references and events together and they DO NOT create even a mildly interesting plot. I wouldn't say this about any other movie I've seen, but this is literally an hour and a half I will NEVER get back.Horrible acting and script. Should have never been released.
This film is not only awful; it's also quite disgusting. It's so bad it doesn't even make me smile.
Maybe the movie isn't really good, but back in that year, i love it

15,549 voters (83.5%) gave this a ONE? I'm sorry. Grossly unfair. This must be some kind of cause celebrity smear campaign like smoking or not voting. If these people actually watched the whole movie, I think they went into it with the wrong mindset. Any kind of a critic is the last kind of a person that should watch this movie. It is what it is for Pete's sake.A lot of pretty good (enough) actors (or lookalikes) went to a lot of trouble here. I"m giving it a ten to help balance the scales. I'd give Kim Kardashian and Carmen Electra each a ten {spoiler?} for the wrestling scene alone. Kim - call me.You snobs know you loved to hate it. It's a fine line. Was it not so bad it was good?

reviews.review_title: I don't know, but it made me laugh pretty hard, so...
reviews.content: The ridiculously low rating caught my attention. Curiosity finally got the best of me, so I chanced to watch it. It was a typical spoof movie, like "Meet the Spartans", full of slapstick laughs.The movies I saw where:10,000 B.C., Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, No Country for Old Men, Wanted, Juno, Harold and Kumar, Hancock, The Day After Tomorrow, Jumper, Narnia Prince Caspian, Enchanted, Step Up 1 & 2, Iron Man, Hell Boy, Hulk, Get Smart (dog poop on the phone shoe. What a classic. LOL.), Batman, Speed Racer, Beowulf, Kung Fu Panda, "Me, Myself, and Irene"The dance and fight choreography where impressive, and the special effects weren't bad. Good production value.Debut for some talent, too. I did not recognize the same actor in so many parts.There where also some things that I just didn't understand at all, but they made me laugh anyway, for some reason.... Like the black dance double. What's that about? LMAO?!Sure, I'll play along with the low rating gag. Wouldn't want to ruin it. I didn't know it was just a joke. I guess I'll see "Epic Movie", now.

reviews.review_title: An incoherent and tasteless mess, but certainly not *the* worst movie around
reviews.content: I have to admit that I am not the target audience for Disaster Movie. I have not watched any other of the franchise before and probably don't know the movies it is spoofing well enough to enjoy its "jokes". The only reason I was watching it is that as of the day of writing, this occupies toe top (or bottom?) spot on the IMDB bottom 100 list. According to that ranking it beats stuff like "Manos The Hand of Fate", "Birdemic" and "Saving Christmas", so as a bad movie lover I had to see it. And right off the bat: yeah, the badness oozes right from the first minute of this one. There is incoherent storytelling, bad acting, unfunny and tasteless jokes galore and enough confusing stuff to make your head spin. And yet, this is not the worst movie there is and the reason is Nicole Parker. Even when she first appears as the gasoline gulping Amie Winehouse lookalike the scene becomes enjoyable in a weird way. And when she later reenters the scene as the enchanted princess - although her lines are as crappy or even crappier than those of the rest of the cast - she is neither embarrassed nor pompous, but she seems to be fully aware and she seems to enjoy playing this crap as much as a bad movie lover enjoys watching it.Don't get me wrong, the movie is still a confusing mess filled with tasteless jokes but because of this exceptional performance it is not nearly the worst film I have seen.

reviews.review_title: You Already Know What This Film Is.
reviews.content: If you are on a site like IMDb the you already know what this film is. With that said if you want to see it in the cinema, rent or buy it you should only do so if silly spoofs are your type of film. In exactly the same way as Scary Movie and Meet the Spartans you can watch loads of Hollywood blockbusters get lampooned. This is a modern 'Naked Gun'-a-like.Not the greatest film I have ever seen but if you are into this type of thing then give it a watch. If you aren't then don't watch it, the one thing you shouldn't do is know that you don't like this type of film and then watch it anyway. If you do you will end up just being another fool who spits vitriol about a movie on IMDb because it isn't Lord of the Rings or a life changing blockbuster with an all star cast. Remember not every film is going to be your cup of tea.Having said that, while there are some funny moments I did not really enjoy it, but my neighbours 12 year old girl loved it. It does have a market but probably not the 15-35 year old male that (I imagine) are the usual visitors here.

Disaster Movie is both a misleading title and a very fitting one. First of all, many of the films involved have little or nothing to do with disasters (Enchanted, Alvin and the Chipmunks and Kung Fu Panda for example). Secondly, the film is very much a disaster, lurching from one film to another without any kind of effort made to link them together. As a result, the film feels thoroughly disjointed, to the point where it becomes entertaining just to see what's going to happen next, regardless of how funny it is.There are a couple of highlights- the Chipmunks scene made me laugh- but aside from that you're left agog in wonder at how rushed and bad everything feels, which in turn makes it entertaining.

reviews.review_title: It's so awful and not entertaining
reviews.content: All I can really say about this movie is that it's horrendously awful, but the one star is Carmen Electra so that is the one positive Thing I can say about this movie because Carmen Electra is great

its awful movie not funny at all.i thought its going to be hilarious movie.but no no no its nothing like that,bad story bad actors it was so boring that I've had to sleep every 10 minutes.so i highly recommend not lose your time on this.the real deal for me is scary movie4 that was a movie that you cant pretend that isn't funny.I don't know what they were thinking when they made this movie ,high school musical 3 or wanted and a lot more movies that didn't released in theaters was included in very bad and awful jokes and scenes. so just wait and see how scary movie 5 i hope it will be funny or great movie as we all want.

Not a movie to consider watching with any group of people. Even if you have seen the movies this film makes parodies of, the humor falls dreadfully short of anything that would make you laugh. The lack of an interesting plot is replaced with weak and clichéd one-liners that make this movie a chore to sit through. You will find yourself thinking - "How much longer does this movie have? Where is my order from Amazon? Did I have an appointment today?" and you quickly occupy yourself doing other, much more interesting activities such as writing reviews on IMDb while the movie fills the background with useless noise. How on earth a producer was willing to fund this movie will make one wonder how such good movies can come out of Hollywood with "wet rags" such as Disaster Movie receiving such publicity before a short and stunted appearance in movie theaters Then again if you have ABSOLUTELY NOTHING better to do with an hour and a half of your life, look no further. I would recommend folding laundry instead. While the appearances of familiar faces from other similar comedies such as Epic Movie will create an atmosphere of familiarity, you not feel at all as though you were part of the action, and be fully aware that you are wasting time sitting on your couch watching the worst movie (with little doubt) of 2008.
Good movie. Enjoyed it. The movie is beautifully directed & well scripted. The acting is good. Photography is average and so is music.
Unbelievable film, Dylan Waddington is a fantastic actor, makes the film amazing. Funniest scene when Ethan barley gets run over by a Chinese nun. 10/10!

my favorite bit from the movie is the head on thing it goes 'head on apply directly to the forehead' and repeats 5 times and the girl said 'i just did' and the other girl said 'dont cop an attitude i said head on bitch apply directly to the motherfucking forehead' and the chipmunks chew this kids balls and say 'mmm salty' and this naked guy pretends to be Beowulf and says 'a am Beowulf' 'what you fight naked?' ;yeah its what we do these days isn't it?' 'IT'S KINDA GAY.' NO IT'S NOT' and it does a take off of Hancock and he kicks a kid and sends him flying it does a take off of sex and the city it is pretty good but not the best take off movie

reviews.review_title: Please stop this guy from directing anymore movies!!!
reviews.content: This movie is not funny at all... i watched it earlier today and laughed only once or twice. The movie keeps repeating the stupid parts over and over again just like epic movie. I don't recommend anyone to watch this movie at all! This isn't something to watch in the theaters its something you should watch when there is nothing else to rent at blockbuster or Hollywood videos. For the good of funny movies stop this director from producing any more movies. I have to say scary movie 123 and 4 are funny but he didn't direct them he wrote the story... epic movie, disaster movie,Meet the Spartans, and date movie, are just plain retarded. This movie is a waste of my time, i highly recommend you watch another movie at the theaters than this one.

reviews.review_title: Be sure to leave your brain at home when you go see this movie.
reviews.content: Let's get a few things straight here... I don't watch movies like this to be moved by a deep plot line, to sweat on the edge of my chair by petrifying suspense, and to be stunned by actor's performances. I come to films like these to laugh my butt off. Nothing more, nothing less.If you can open up your mind to the above principals of comedy films, you can truly see this film as I saw it.This film was absolutely hilarious. Sure, the gags were often dirty, sure they were politically incorrect, sure certain people would be offended by it. But honestly, it's just a cheap comedy meant to cause people to laugh until they have heart attacks. It's what the directors intended, and in my opinion they succeeded in it very well.So, if you can possibly lower your IQ by a few points for an hour and half, I'm sure you'll find this movie very enjoyable.

"Disaster Movie" is great in every aspect, with the script being the crowning achievement. This film excels way beyond the standard of spoof-films set by Mel Brooks. One of the very few things lacking was an appearance by Leslie Nielsen. The movie features non-stop hilarity that will have everyone reeling with laughter for years to come. Walking out of the movie my entire body felt sore from laughing so hard and for so long. I enjoy all the pop culture references and how accurate they were to what they were portraying. The part with Dr. Phil was excellent, and I enjoyed it especially when he got shot. It's hilarious; I cannot emphasize that enough. Take your friends, your family, and even your dog to see this movie. It will provide great memories for many generations to come. Your great grandchildren will purchase this movie on some sort of futuristic movie watching device. This movie is Oscar worthy and FFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUCCCCKKK KILL ME I WANT TO DIE.

This movie has obviously not pleased others but despite that, I think the movie was hilarious! There are plenty of scenes that made me laugh, especially watching it with friends. The film isn't supposed to be the most "amazing" film of the year, it is supposed to make fun of other movies and give the watcher a laugh and that is exactly what it did. Although some scenes are very random and some of the characters do not apply to the "disaster" theme, the film is lighthearted and should not be taken on too strongly. The film enjoyment depends on your level of humour, if your looking for serious humour then maybe this is not the best film but if your looking for a little laugh with a group of friends then this film is worth watching.

Watching this movie was a total mistake. I wasted my time (and my brain's cells) watching this "movie". I can't believe the directors has enough courage to put this disaster movie in the cinema.First of all: there is NO plot. All happen around 4 kids who have no personalities and nothing enjoyable. Also, the characters of other movies, and the pop stars who appeared, are so awful, so awful that I wanted to suicide. Amy Winehouse was ugly, but she had a merit: she can warn us the disaster of this movie.This is one of the worst movies I have ever seen. The scene of Juno and Sarah Jessica Parker, and the sequence of High School Musical were disgusting. I would give a zero, but I can't.

When i first heard of this movie i wasnt really sure what to expect, but after a brief glance at the trailer i decided to give it a shot, and boy was it the ride of my lifematt lanter as will smith really sold me on this movie, his authenticity and passion in the role as the sole black character of the film brought back emmories of the good old days of adam sandler. i could really feel the heat of the moment through his character and he highlighted every aspect of the movie. (i especially liked the part where his testicles were eatin by alvin!!! aha!)but the pinnacle of the movvie for me was when matt lanter and kim kardashian got married at the end! not many movies touch with me so emotionally, but i couldnt help but shed a tear at that scene. the line whehre the priest said "touch my balls" really resonated with me emotinally and brought back my childhood memories of being molested.all in all, a great movie that i highly recommend, fun for the whole family!

Only because i cant rate 0.... When i was sitting in the movies i was hyped to see this movie... Though through the first few Min's of it ( i saw all the movie they parodies about) It was so dry and unfunny. They have to stop making scary movie type, It was funny and original the first time but now it getting old and corny. The acting is horrible too i don't know why my classmates say it the funniest movie ever when obviously it isn't. If i had a chance to see the director of this film i will slap him across the face so hard he would'not even feel it :P In conclusion i don't recommend this movie to anyone, anywhere unless there suicidal 1/10 and I'm being generous...

reviews.review_title: Same Old but better than the other two.
reviews.content: Was it bad, yes. Is it the worst, No.I went to see this with and I knew I wasn't going to like this, it was not good but it isn't the worst movie, I thought Epic Movie was worst.Of course, it does drag on and on and most of the jokes aren't funny or they try way to hard. One good thing about it was Nicole Parker, I feel that she made the movie watchable. The whole story (If there was one) Was confusing and stupid. They would go on to, lets say, Juno's water braking, then, she is OK again. I know it's not meant to be taken to heart and all but it was was still not much of a movie, most of the characters got annoying and you wish they would just go off screen already! They copy movies that weren't really on DVD yet (when filming some of the movies weren't out yet). Another annoying part was when some of the characters kept repeating the line, Mcloving or whatever he says got old really fast.On a plus side, I did like this better than the last two mistakes they did, Epic Movie was unbearable and I feel that should be lower than this. Juno and The princess are really the only ones that I liked.Go see this if you really have nothing better to do and just want to switch off and watch a pointless movie.(out of 10)Acting ***** Story ** Funny rating **** Overall *****I give it extra for the fact that I liked it better than Epic and Meet, but I won't be buying this anytime soon.

reviews.review_title: Look on the bright side, It can't be any worse then this
reviews.content: It's quite clear that the "Directors" Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer has no intentions of making a good movie or telling a compelling story. Instead we have two middle aged men with the humor compatibility of a couple of 10 year old's. But let's not talk about the directors let's focus on the movie, right away you can see why this movie isn't going to work. The jokes don't lead up to anything, there's a scene were an actor who plays Juney (Get it? Like Juno? F*cking brilliant!) beats up Carrie from sex and the city with her foot just like in the scene from 'Don't mess with the Zohan', There's a difference between parodying and just plain ripping off. All i want to say is: Do something else with your money, because you are just giving it to people who don't deserve it in the first place. There are people out there who actually thinks it's a enjoyable movie and actually can't understand why people don't like it. I have been called an idiot when i expressed my honest opinions of the movie (Yeah, really!). Stop sucking Jason and Aaron's di*ks (They clearly don't care what their fans thinks they just want your money)and grow a brain cell before you start bitching about my taste in movies. I know sh*t when i see it and you don't get any closer then this!

Some guys here defend this flick,
I see myself able to defend "Scary Movie 1-4"
which are art in their own way...
where you see people having fun and being creativehere...
its just a very lazy salad of all the popular movies of that time,
that being referenced only for the sake of being referenced, with nothing clever to be said or satirizedthe joke is allways the same, someone getting a pan in his face, or a kick in the balls,
ohhhh you know that popular character?! you know whats gonna be real funny?! him getting a kick in the balls! ha ha ha ha!
thats not funny!I give it a 2 instead of 1, only because the song at the end was the only thing that made me giggle

reviews.review_title: Well, the name of the movie says it all...
reviews.content: It's bad it's actually a disaster, and the director understands that...

reviews.review_title: Words can't describe how bad this POS of a film is.
reviews.content: In fact, this is possibly the worst film I've ever seen. We were already tortured by Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer's horrible works in the past such as "Date Movie", "Epic Movie", and "Meet the Spartans", so we don't need another movie from them. But no! They had the guts to make matters worse and make another movie (they're currently making a "Twilight" spoof as well).At least the creators got the title right, for this was a disaster! And no, I'm not saying this is a disaster as in a lot of disastrous scenes happening (such as the apocalypse), I'm saying "disaster" as in this is a horrible film! I've seen better parody movies than this such as "Spaceballs", "Airplane", and hell, even the "Scary Movie" movies."Disaster Movie" is a parody of the remake of "Cloverfield". Four friends struggle to survive a series of unfortunate events along with characters from movies that were popular during the time the film was being made (ex. Enchanted, Juno, Indiana Jones, The Incredible Hulk, etc.) The jokes were corny and too YouTube Poop-related. In fact, the only scene that made me laugh is where Hannah Montana gets crushed by an asteroid (considering I'm a heavy hater of that show), but even that can't save this "disaster". But this movie gets even worse once you get to the end, where all of the characters sing a song of having sex with characters of the same sex orientation. That is considered PG-13 material?! This is almost as ridiculous as those sex references from "Transformers 2", another PG-13 movie.This movie is the worst thing since soap operas. Before I end this review, I'd like to say something to Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer: for the sake of humanity, STOP making movies.

reviews.review_title: Don't let the haters fool you.
reviews.content:
Trust me, this is not as bad as people say. In fact, it's a misunderstood piece of art only the ones with critic eye will recognize. And I'll tell you why.
Yes, I know you probably disliked this review already, but if you can think by yourself consider what you're reading.Each minute of this film it's funny, entertaining and well done considering the low budget. For what they could've done this is nothing but a true work of comedy. A truly masterpiece and the pinacle of the genre. The top of the pyramid nobody but a genius mind can reach. Am I exagerating? Maybe a bit because of the unfair low rating, but certainly, this gem covered with gold doesn't deserve less than a 9 out of 10.Sometimes I feel sad on how a trending of bad criticism can ruin the reputation of a work of outstanding artistry like this one.
I'll finish saying you have to watch and evaluate this underrated gem by yourself. Once you did, you will not regret have reading this honest review of an unknown helper.

reviews.review_title: A really really bad movie that still has it's moments
reviews.content: First I'd like to say, that if people couldn't see the star-rating before giving their own vote, this movie would likely have a better rating. This system wouldn't serve the public, but it would give a more accurate view of what people really think about the movie.That said, I don't find this movie as bad as you might think due to the amazingly low rating. Disaster Movie is really bad and it lacks plot, but it has few funny scenes that in my books earns it 3 points. Most of the time you just watch it amazed how someone found an investor for a piece of crap like this, but the few funny parts ease the pain.I don't recommend that you watch this, but if you feel that you must, don't even think about buying it. Even renting this movie is a bit too generous, since you'd have to give your hard earned money to the movie-people who pulled this embarrassment together. You will most likely be disappointed, maybe even angry for wasting your time, but if your friend happens to own this monster, then give it a shot. There still are way worse movies than this.

Rest of the movie: medium good: Hannah Montana dying was medium and the Sex and the City fight was good and funny, Chipmunks and Enchanted princess was funny and the museum sequence was somewhat boring and Dance off was funny, now F**K Song was funny and the movie ended good.

reviews.review_title: Not the best, but not the worst
reviews.content: There are two enigmatic writers of these kinds of movies: Jason Friedburg and Aaron Seltzer. They've written all of the spoof movies that have released in the recent years sans Superhero Movie. Each of them has received an overwhelmingly negative response from moviegoers, but this could be getting the worst rep.The fact of the matter is that this movie caters to a specific audience. If you enjoyed, let's say, No Country for Old Men because of it's plot and acting ability, you will not like this film. If you enjoy movies for comedy value, you may enjoy the movie. However, this movie is mostly stupid comedy, such as a cow coming out of a tornado to land on Iron Man trying to stop it. If you only laugh at witty, pertinent comedy you will not find this movie enjoyable at all. If you think, for example, that the princess from Enchanted getting hit by a car not knowing what kind of "creature" it is, is "lazy" then you won't enjoy the movie because you're too busy criticizing the movie to try to enjoy it. There are several jokes that aren't as shallow. For instance, Wolf's monologue in the beginning of the movie is hardly as slapstick. And after Matt Lanter's character, spoofing Jumper, accidentally lands on Prince Caspian's (played by Ike Barinholtz) sword, he calls Will "the man who ruined Star Wars" which could either be a reference to Hayden Christiansen who was the lead in "Jumper" or it could be a reference to the fact that Matt Lanter played the animated Anakin in Star Wars: the Clone Wars.Many people's first beefs with this movie is that not all of the movies spoofed are disaster-based movies. The "disaster" in the title refers to the movie written by Friedburg and Seltzer, not the movies that they spoof. High School Musical is far from a disaster movie, no? The point I want to make with this movie is that this movie is far from the worst ever made. You can't honestly say that you would rather boil your eyes than watch this movie. That's just weird.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't a comedy need to be funny at least 1 time?
reviews.content: This is like watching paint dry except your chest starts to hurt because you are wasting life watching it. Paint drying is funnier than this. A spoof should have something funny in it....this doesn't.Is there a civil suit against them for releasing this garbage into existence?

reviews.review_title: The first half sucked total ass, but it got some better at the end.
reviews.content: I got to say that the main things that seamed to save this movie from being a COMPLETE pile of horse crap was the Princess character and the song at the end about f***ing. I know humor is highly subjective, but I enjoyed parts of maybe half of the movie and disliked the rest. So if they could ever edit out the crap and replace it with some better stuff down the road then this movie could someday be redeemed.It is a shame really, since this movie could have been a LOT better if it was properly edited by the director. I think the directors of the MadTV show should have been able to do a lot better then this.I don't understand why a review must contain so many lines, but I will do my best to add them if IMDb really wants to wast the space.

reviews.review_title: The Best Worst Movie of the Year
reviews.content: Nicole Parker knocks it out of the park in this movie. She's the #1 reason you have to see this flick. The theater was laughing out loud at her antics as the Enchanted Princess. Her Amy Winehouse spoof is hilarious, and done perfectly.Next best would be Crista Flanagan who cleans up with her Juno spoofs. I didn't care for the script writing in terms of the way she exits the movie (no spoiler here). Likewise, the writers could have given her more to work with in her Hannah Montana bit.Ike Barinholtz as Beowolf is not to be missed. I never new this guy had such talent until seeing him play about a dozen side-splitting characters in this film.Vanessa Mannillo and Matt Lanter are such great eye candy for you and your girlfriend to watch during any lulls in the movie that you can't give this less than 8 stars out of 10. A hilarious no-brainer comedy that's just what the doctor ordered for a few laughs after a long day's work.

I saw this at the cinemas last week, and i'm seriously considering going to see it at LEAST 3 more times. It's hilarious! The Princess was my favourite and so was Batman. It was funny all the way through it! So many spoofs. The songs are awesome and the characters are very charming and clever. If you like hilariously funny movies... watch this one. You won't be disappointed. If you are a person who is up to date with Hollywood and the latest movies, you will find this funny and get all the jokes. There are some sad parts but mostly funny. I hope they keep making funny movies like this forever. And Remember... all the most funniest movies end in "movie" like Scary movie, date movie, superhero movie, epic movie, and Disaster movie.

Exploitative nudity, wildly offensive and unfunny jokes, abhorrent so-called 'parodies' and just about everything bad that could possibly be cram in a movie.Disaster Movie doesn't have a single original bone in its body. It is a husk of a film with no creativity or thought put into it, just mindless references that pad out the painful runtime. The premise of this movie is a group of young adults run around whilst the world is ending and the protagonist tries to win his girlfriend back, although very little of the runtime is actually dedicated to progressing this storyline. Instead, we are treated to embarrassing dance sequences and a series of skits featuring characters from other IPs - without being hyperbolic I would estimate that maybe 80% of the film is just filler. My main issue with the film is how clever it thinks it is; poking fun at various franchises and showing off with constant nudity and perverted humour. There I really cannot convey through words just how difficult it is to endure this film.This film isn't worth devoting my energy to; it's lame, it's offensive and I understand that it's a spoof but that doesn't exempt it from being rightfully criticized. Without a doubt one of the worst films I have seen, yet an excellent showcase of what not to do in film. 1/10.
The mona lisa of movies its the best ever its wonderful edge of my seat i dont giveaway 10s that easily watch it it really entertaining i wish i could erase my memory and watch it again.

I have seem most of these Friedberg/Seltzer films, despite knowing full well how bad they would be. What can I say? They fascinate me. Pretty much everyone intelligent enough to have an IMDb account knows why they're bad if they've ever seen any of the trailers. DISATSER MOVIE is, like all of them, useless. I didn't laugh. But it's still noticeably better than MEET THE SPARTANS. Despite the horrible costumes and puppets, it's not as horribly cheap looking and flimsy. It does have an embarrassingly empty "comic dance off sequence", but at least unlike SPARTANS it doesn't take up about 25% of the screen time. The JUNO spoof has a little bite to it, and Crista Flanagan's impression is pretty good. Nicole Parker brings some energy to the ENCHANTED spoof. It's not quite as jaw-dropping in its condescension to the audience as SPARTANS, which had the genuinely unbelievable moment where Friedberg and Seltzer thought they needed a narrator to explain that a scene where Carmen Electra wore a SPIDER-MAN suit was a SPIDER-MAN parody. Where SPARTANS had several gross-out gags that were too nauseating to be even vaguely amusing, DISASTER MOVIE has only one.Is it really worth noting that DISASTER MOVIE is an improvement when it's still painfully unfunny? Well if you had a student who failed all his classes and was also excessively disruptive, and he went to merely failing his classes, you'd have to say one or two nice things on parent's night.The best thing you can say about DISASTER MOVIE is that it's exhaustive check-list "parodying" of almost every major summer 2008 release might make it a somewhat effective nostalgia trip in another decade or so.

reviews.review_title: Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer are back with yet another comedic gem!
reviews.content: First there was DATE MOVIE....then EPIC MOVIE (truly epic)......then MEET THE SPARTANS....and now, ladies and gentlemen, from the guys who brought you the aforementioned comedy classics, comes perhaps their greatest,most inventive and most hilarious work yet, "DISASTER MOVIE".The movie Makes fun of everyone and everything from the teenage **** Hanna Montana, Money-chasing-no-talent-sell-out Will smith's drunken superhero character from "Hancock", the braindead-chickflick Sex in the city", the teenage pregnancy flick "Juno", as well as many other superhero flicks from the past year.You would, like the other movies produced by the same people, need to have seen the movies they are making fun with, in order to find this movie even more funny. This movie is like one big laugh, you can barely catch your breath before the next thing crack you up, you would have to be extremely dull if you do not find this movie the slightest big funny. This twisted form of humor is just so great, and the way things happen in the movie is truly epic, you constantly get surprised of the makers ways of introducing stuff, you just sit back laugh and wonder how the hell did they come up with stuff like that.VERDICT: Hilarious hilarious hilarious movie that I would absolutely recommend to anyone looking for complex and twisted humor.10/10 and a contender for the greatest movie ever made.

reviews.review_title: Should i be ashamed that i like this,,, a bit?
reviews.content: Now in the years I have watched some excellent films. Shawshank redemption, The Green Mile, Dragonfly, The bucket list... This film, even before watching, I knew this wouldn't measure anywhere near to these classics. Since Date Move and Epic movie forced me to punch myself in the face with disappointment and rage, I vowed never to watch a crappy parody movie again. That was until Superhero Movie hit our screens. With the taste of what I believed to be a great, hilarious movie still on the tip of my tongue, I decided to give this movie a chance and to my own surprise... I was mildly entertained.No, this movie isn't great, it was never going to be, but there are some very entertaining and hilarious moments in it, which kept me in my seat wanting more. The actors weren't great; we'll its pretty much the cast of MadTV but actress Nicole Parker pulled off her role well and stole the show for me as the Enchanted Princess.For me this movie wasn't great but it was okay  I guess it all really depends on what mood you're in  If it's silly and careless, then you will have a giggle  If it is serious and apathetic, you will hate it. For hesitant viewers wondering whether or not to pay a few bucks to go see this in the theatre, I say "Don't bother" Wait for it to come to DVD, haggle it for a 50 cents and then watch it.

reviews.review_title: It's supposed to be a spoof
reviews.content: Just turn of your brain and let yourself be in a be movie knowing that it's meant to silly. I think way too many people are taking the movie way too seriously and expect it to be some masterpiece. With everything going on in the world, it's nice to be able to sit and watch this movie and not think about anything for the 90 minutes or so that this movie is. If you're looking for something serious, this isn't the movie for you, if you just want to sit back and not pay attention and giggle at the stupidity, then this is the movie for you. It really is not as bad as people make it out to be. I also feel like it's a better spoof movie than epic movie, vampires suck, and movies in that category.

My actual review of this movie is 0.5, but 1 is the lowest rating I can give. This is the number one worst movie of all time. Forget Garbage Pail Kids and Freddy Got Fingered, this is the worst one. It's full of shameless references, such as Iron Man, Batman, Kung Fu Panda, Indiana Jones, the list goes on. One other thing that really bothers me about this movie is that it's so beamingly proud of itself. Does this movie think it's being funny? In what critical thinking mind is this funny. It has stupid pointless references, creepy implications, uncompfortable fight and fetish scenes, and revolting immature jokes with little to no payoff. Garbage Pail Kids was more cruel, and Freddy Got Fingered was more immoral, but Disaster Movie is an inescapable night terror with no redeeming qualities.

Just look to the small details (Juno's expressions, Sex and the City crazy thoughts, Batman's voice, Beowolf's "I am", and so on!)

reviews.review_title: I think the review guidelines need to be changed here
reviews.content: I'm sitting here reading these posted reviews for this movie and thinking to myself either all these reviewers are over 80 years old or they are wound so tight they squeak when they walk....or both. The movie is FUN...it's STUPID COMEDY...just because every movie isn't Ben Hur or The Godfather doesn't make it total junk. If someone is going to read the reviews of this movie, then odds are they know what this movie is about. And they don't need to hear what a bunch of square eggs say about it, either. It would be tantamount to asking a bunch of 18-year-olds writing a review on the silent film "The Birth of a Nation". In my opinion, any review giving a movie less than 5 stars must've been written by someone not appreciating what the movie is all about (and should be discarded). In other words, people who shouldn't have watched the movie in the first place. Maybe every movie theater should ALWAYS have Driving Miss Daisy available to these people just in case they may be "forced" to watch something different. That being said, I loved Date Movie, Superhero Movie, and a whole list of other stupid comedy movies and I don't think this movie was that bad...though not that great, either. If you liked Meet the Spartans, you'll like this one. It is pretty fast-paced and there are some funny parts you'll remember. I really would give this movie a 6 or 7, but I'm upping it to an 8 because I don't think a 1.3 rating is fair AT ALL.Hope this helps someone.

reviews.review_title: besides the usual crap they make pretty good sketches
reviews.content: If your thinking about seeing this movie you obviously already see another ..... movie. You know what kind of movie this is. Its a spoof, a parody about other movies, in this case disaster movies.And those parodies are OK, ignoring the burping, hitting and midgets. They put recognizable situations of other movies, and making them funny. The Juno chick is a good example combined with the Zohan. Or how they make fun of Sarah Jessica parker (everbody thinks it but nobody says it). In comparison with date movie, meet the spartan this is overall a better movie.Also sometimes it's to fake to watch, but that's part of the style. You could categorize it under exploitation movies for the 70's. They try to make money out of other 'good' movies. This movie is not meant to have exceptional style of camera/framing/shots, so do not criticize it. We all agree that it's not there best point to say the least.Ps. if your uptight and have a serious look on life do not watch this movie or give it any attention. You are not the focus group.
Horribly good. The movie is a parody of disaster movies, for which I think it accurately portrayed while introducing random comedic themes.

reviews.review_title: You know what, I'm giving this a 10!
reviews.content: Please read my review before voting up or down on my comment. To give you some background I'm not a huge fan of spoof movies but I have watched a lot of them. Probably the first one being Don't Be a Menace... which was solid. Scary Movie 1 and 2, I thought were funny and enjoyable. Scary Movie 3 was horrid. Scary Movie 4 was a disaster. Epic movie, I'm not even kidding here worst movie ever made. I skipped Date Movie and Meet the Spartans just because I could tell by the previews they would be on the Epic movie level of worst movies. But out of sheer boredom I decide to watch Disaster Movie. It starts off rough, I hate 10000 BC and Amy Winehouse. They spoof pretty much everything from Juno to Alvin and the Chipmunks to Iron Man to Indiana Jones and Kung Fu Panda. There are certainly some questionable scenes that are flat out not funny or just horribly done but whatever I wasn't expecting much going in. But I give it a 10 because everyone else gives it a 1. If you watch Epic Movie and this back to back you will see this deserves a much higher rating, it's also better than the ones I listed up there after Scary Movie 2. I like the singing portions with the kids from high school also because it's funny. It's definitely better than the crap they have been pumping out the last 3-4 years.
